column4: willie: ubuntu is compatible. Make sure your gfx card supports it tho
SHould I get a second one though?
Could I ask an opinion really quick: Is getting a second monitor worth it? Does it increase your productivity at all? Is Ubuntu *automagically* compatible with multiple monitors?
I use 2 monitors. Can't say i'm anymore prodictive. switching desktops in ubuntu is just as useful for me
